oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: This account is again followed by the Anteater s laws concerning the habits of various animals, such as the jackal, the 'L ffelhund' (Proteles), etc., who were, once upon a time, men. (L II.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The story of the Strandwolf and the Aardwolf and how they each marry their own kind (the Anteater's laws)
